generic <typename TChannel> public ref class ConfigurationDuplexChannelFactory sealed : System::ServiceModel::DuplexChannelFactory<TChannel>

typeparam.name: TChannel
typeparam.span: 已创建的终结点元素的通信通道的类型。

span.span: The type of communications channel for the endpoint element that is created.

summary.span: 提供创建和管理不同类型的双工通道的功能，这些通道可用于在服务终结点之间发送和接收消息。

span.span: Provides the functionality to create and manage duplex channels of different types that are used to send and receive messages to and from service endpoints.

span.span: The process that responds to a message from the client.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified callback object, endpoint configuration name, remote address, and configuration settings.
